SELECT RESERVATION_NO , RENTAL_PLACE , FN_COMM_NAME(RENTAL_PLACE) AS RENTAL_PLACE_NAME , RETURN_PLACE , FN_COMM_NAME(RETURN_PLACE) AS RETURN_PLACE_NAME , RENTAL_DATE , RETURN_DATE , CAR_IDENTIFICATION_NUMBER , RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO , FN_COMM_NAME(RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO) AS RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NAME , RESERVATION_MEMBER_ID , NAME AS RESERVATION_MEMBER_NAME , REGULAR_PRICE , SALE_RATE , FINAL_RESERVATION_PRICE , REG_ID , REG_DATE , MOD_ID , MOD_DATE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER by RCR.RENTAL_DATE) AS RN , RCR.*, M.* FROM RENTAL_CAR_RESERVATION RCR, MEMBER M WHERE RCR.RESERVATION_MEMBER_ID = M.ID AND RENTAL_DATE > SYSDATE AND CANCEL_YN = 'N' AND RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO = #{keyword} )
WHERE RN BETWEEN #{firstRecordIndex} AND #{lastRecordIndex}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RENTAL_CAR_RESERVATION WHERE RENTAL_DATE > SYSDATE AND CANCEL_YN = 'N' AND RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO = #{keyword}

SELECT RESERVATION_NO , RENTAL_PLACE , FN_COMM_NAME(RENTAL_PLACE) AS RENTAL_PLACE_NAME , RETURN_PLACE , FN_COMM_NAME(RETURN_PLACE) AS RETURN_PLACE_NAME , RENTAL_DATE , RETURN_DATE , CAR_IDENTIFICATION_NUMBER , RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO , FN_COMM_NAME(RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO) AS RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NAME , RESERVATION_MEMBER_ID , NAME AS RESERVATION_MEMBER_NAME , REGULAR_PRICE , SALE_RATE , FINAL_RESERVATION_PRICE , REG_ID , REG_DATE , MOD_ID , MOD_DATE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER by RCR.RENTAL_DATE) AS RN , RCR.*, M.* FROM RENTAL_CAR_RESERVATION RCR, MEMBER M WHERE RCR.RESERVATION_MEMBER_ID = M.ID AND RETURN_DATE < SYSDATE AND CANCEL_YN = 'N' AND RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO = #{keyword} )
WHERE RN BETWEEN #{firstRecordIndex} AND #{lastRecordIndex}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RENTAL_CAR_RESERVATION WHERE RETURN_DATE < SYSDATE AND CANCEL_YN = 'N' AND RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO = #{keyword}

SELECT RESERVATION_NO , RENTAL_PLACE , FN_COMM_NAME(RENTAL_PLACE) AS RENTAL_PLACE_NAME , RETURN_PLACE , FN_COMM_NAME(RETURN_PLACE) AS RETURN_PLACE_NAME , RENTAL_DATE , RETURN_DATE , CAR_IDENTIFICATION_NUMBER , RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO , FN_COMM_NAME(RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO) AS RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NAME , RESERVATION_MEMBER_ID , NAME AS RESERVATION_MEMBER_NAME , REGULAR_PRICE , SALE_RATE , FINAL_RESERVATION_PRICE , REG_ID , REG_DATE , MOD_ID , MOD_DATE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER by RCR.RENTAL_DATE) AS RN , RCR.*, M.* FROM RENTAL_CAR_RESERVATION RCR, MEMBER M WHERE RCR.RESERVATION_MEMBER_ID = M.ID AND SYSDATE BETWEEN RENTAL_DATE AND RETURN_DATE AND CANCEL_YN = 'N' AND RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO = #{keyword} )
WHERE RN BETWEEN #{firstRecordIndex} AND #{lastRecordIndex}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RENTAL_CAR_RESERVATION WHERE SYSDATE BETWEEN RENTAL_DATE AND RETURN_DATE AND CANCEL_YN = 'N' AND RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO = #{keyword}

SELECT RV.* , FN_PAYMENT_STATUS_NAME(PM.STATUS) AS STATUS , PM.CARD_NAME , PM.CARD_NUMBER , PM.PAID_AMOUNT , FN_PAYMENT_PG_PROVIDER_NAME(PM.PG_PROVIDER) AS PG_PROVIDER , PM.CARD_QUOTA , TO_CHAR(PM.PAID_AT / (60 * 60 * 24) + TO_DATE('19700101090000', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS PAID_AT FROM GENIECAR.RESERVATION_VIEW RV LEFT JOIN PAYMENT PM ON RV.RESERVATION_NO = PM.MERCHANT_UID WHERE RESERVATION_NO = #{reservationNo} AND RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO = #{branchCode}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RENTAL_CAR_RESERVATION WHERE CANCEL_YN = 'Y' AND RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO = #{keyword}
